definition[0]: someone who changes spoken words from one language into another, especially as their job
example[0]: Speaking through an interpreter  (=using an interpreter), Ahmed said, ‘I’m very worried about my wife and children.’
definition[1]: a computer program that changes an instruction into a form that can be understood directly by the computer
definition[2]: someone who translates what someone says from one language into another, especially as their job
example[1]: Speaking through an interpreter, the Foreign Minister explained how impressed he had been with the new factory.
